channel.title: Awsredis on Nick Fisher's tech blog
channel.description: Recent content in Awsredis on Nick Fisher's tech blog

item.title: Why Redis Pub/Sub is not SQS, and Vice Versa
item.description: Redis has a pub/sub feature whereby there are publishers and subscribers, and publishers can fanout messages to subscribers. SQS [ amazon's simple queue service] has message senders and receivers. They can both be useful, but in practice they produce different results.
